languages.text: "Победа над болезнью — благая цель, но я не одобряю твои методы. Набери из матросов добровольцев, которые за компенсацию будут заражены. Ожидаю, что в итоге ты вылечишь их всех".

traits.locale_text: "Победа над болезнью — благая цель, но я не одобряю твои методы. Набери из матросов добровольцев, которые за компенсацию будут твоими испытуемыми. Ожидаю, что в итоге ты вылечишь их всех".

languages.text: "Defeating a disease is a noble goal, but I cannot approve of your methods. Find volunteers among the crew who will agree to being infected in exchange for compensation. I expect you to cure every one of them once you are done."
languages.original_text: "Победа над болезнью — благая цель, но я не одобряю твои методы. Набери из матросов добровольцев, которые за компенсацию будут заражены. Ожидаю, что в итоге ты вылечишь их всех".

"Defeating a disease is a noble goal, but I cannot approve of your methods. Find volunteers among the crew who will agree to being infected in exchange for compensation. I expect you to cure every one of them once you are done."

languages.text: « Vaincre une maladie est un noble objectif, mais je ne peux cautionner vos méthodes. Recrutez parmi l'équipage des volontaires qui accepteront de se faire infecter moyennant compensation. Et quand vous en aurez terminé, je compte sur vous pour tous les soigner. »
languages.original_text: "Defeating a disease is a noble goal, but I cannot approve of your methods. Find volunteers among the crew who will agree to being infected in exchange for compensation. I expect you to cure every one of them once you are done."

traits.locale_text: « Vaincre une maladie est un noble objectif, mais je ne peux cautionner vos méthodes. Recrutez parmi l'équipage des volontaires qui accepteront de se faire infecter moyennant compensation. Et quand vous en aurez terminé, je compte sur vous pour tous les soigner. »

languages.text: «Acabar con una enfermedad es un objetivo noble, pero no apruebo sus métodos. Encuentre voluntarios por la tripulación que estén dispuestos a infectarse a cambio de una compensación. Espero que todos acaben sanos una vez consiga la cura».
languages.original_text: "Defeating a disease is a noble goal, but I cannot approve of your methods. Find volunteers among the crew who will agree to being infected in exchange for compensation. I expect you to cure every one of them once you are done."

traits.locale_text: «Acabar con una enfermedad es un objetivo noble, pero no apruebo sus métodos. Encuentre voluntarios por la tripulación que estén dispuestos a infectarse a cambio de una compensación. Espero que todos acaben sanos una vez consiga la cura».

languages.text: 「病気を克服することは崇高な目標だが、その方法には賛成できない。報酬と引き換えに感染することに同意する志願者を乗組員の中から見つけるのだ。そして、完了したら一人残らず完治させるのだ」
languages.original_text: "Defeating a disease is a noble goal, but I cannot approve of your methods. Find volunteers among the crew who will agree to being infected in exchange for compensation. I expect you to cure every one of them once you are done."

traits.locale_text: 「病気を克服することは崇高な目標だが、その方法には賛成できない。報酬と引き換えに感染することに同意する志願者を乗組員の中から見つけるのだ。そして、完了したら一人残らず完治させるのだ」

languages.text: “战胜疾病是个崇高的目标，但我不赞成你实现目标的手段。我命令你在船员之中征募自愿参加实验换取报酬的志愿者，我也希望你能在实验结束之后把所有志愿者都治好。”
languages.original_text: "Defeating a disease is a noble goal, but I cannot approve of your methods. Find volunteers among the crew who will agree to being infected in exchange for compensation. I expect you to cure every one of them once you are done."

traits.locale_text: “战胜疾病是个崇高的目标，但我不赞成你实现目标的手段。我命令你在船员之中征募自愿参加实验换取报酬的志愿者，我也希望你能在实验结束之后把所有志愿者都治好。”

languages.text: "Die Bekämpfung einer Krankheit ist ein nobles Ziel, aber ich kann Eure Methoden nicht gutheißen. Findet in den Reihen der Crew Freiwillige, die bereit sind, sich für eine Entschädigung infizieren zu lassen. Ich erwarte, dass Ihr jeden Einzelnen von ihnen heilt, sobald Ihr so weit seid."
languages.original_text: "Defeating a disease is a noble goal, but I cannot approve of your methods. Find volunteers among the crew who will agree to being infected in exchange for compensation. I expect you to cure every one of them once you are done."

traits.locale_text: "Die Bekämpfung einer Krankheit ist ein nobles Ziel, aber ich kann Eure Methoden nicht gutheißen. Findet in den Reihen der Crew Freiwillige, die bereit sind, für eine Entschädigung infizieren zu lassen. Ich erwarte, dass Ihr jeden Einzelnen von ihnen heilt, sobald Ihr so weit seid."

languages.text: "Bir hastalığın kökünü kazımak, asil bir gaye. Ancak yöntemlerini tasvip edemem. Mürettebat arasından tazmin karşılığında enfekte olmayı kabul eden gönüllüler bul. Çalışman bittiğinde her birini tedavi etmeni bekliyorum."
languages.original_text: "Defeating a disease is a noble goal, but I cannot approve of your methods. Find volunteers among the crew who will agree to being infected in exchange for compensation. I expect you to cure every one of them once you are done."
